content: http //dinamiccrochet blogspot com by thata pang 08 note this pattern for personal use only i have this idea when i ate an icecream yesterday i think it will be cutie if i make a christmas ornament with it look at my stash and da da simple easy but cutie if you don t have a stick ice cream you can make it as a christmas ribbon hang to your wall or roll over your christmas tree material cotton yarn red and green crochet hook 2 50 mm ice cream stick tranparant glue instruction green colour r1 make chain 58 slip_stitch at 6 st from the hook ch2 skip ch2 slip_stitch repeat across r2 turn ch2 6dc at the loop ch2 slip_stitch at the same loop repeat again at each loop across fasten_off red colour make r2 at the other side of r1 top of ice cream joint together with single_crochet sts 2 side of green and red at last petal 7 single_crochet fasten_off tail/hanger start hanger from skip 2 sts at each side chain 20-25 depend on how long do you like finishing you only put the ice stick inside the loop between red and green colour roll at the ice cream stick to make it a different colour at each row just twist it and you ll have a red and green colour you can make it with your style too depend on what you like last put the top of ice cream fix with a transparent glue now you can put it at your christmas tree in you home have a happy christmas graph instruction
